author: jfarcand
msg: Fix for bug 22032: missing security-policy in default-configuration.

Precompiled JSPs running under the security manager always have to access org.apache.jasper.runtime.* classes. With the package protection mechanism turned on, those precompiled JSPs are being rejected by the security manager. The solution is to grant access to org.apache.jasper.runtime.* (unfortunatly there is no othe rway).
Submitted by: Matthias Mezger ( mezger at gmx.de )
